name: World's ONLY 3-Room FIRST CLASS Suite (Etihad A380 Residence)
description:
Watch this video to see what it’s like to fly in the most exclusive cabin in the sky: Etihad’s Residence on their Airbus A380!

This three room suite on the Etihad A380 is unlike anything else in the air. We flew from Abu Dhabi to London and experienced everything the Residence had to offer: From the luxurious living room to the opulent bedroom and even the super lux shower! This may just be the world's biggest First Class seat and so much more!!

In this video, you’ll see a complete Etihad Residence Tour, along with the First Class food, impressive inflight entertainment, incredible accommodation, and even the top-notch service from Eithad Airways.

Etihad Airways’ “Residence” is just about the most luxurious and over-the-top experience you can book on any commercial airline. I’ve dreamed of trying it for nearly a decade and can’t believe the opportunity finally came…and it’s all thanks to YOU! Because you watch our videos, we were able to share this unbelievable experience with you!

We’ll even show you how to book the flight for less using a trick a friend shared with us.

At the end, we’ll rate the entire experience using the JebScore and show you exactly how we bought our tickets and what we paid for this.

0:00 Introduction
1:52 Etihad First Class Lounge
6:13 Boarding Etihad Residence
8:17 Residence Lunch
9:52 Etihad Residence Tour
11:50 Residence Shower
14:01 Etihad Residence JebScore
16:05 Bloopers

Here’s more about booking the Residence:
https://samchui.com/2023/07/27/etihad-a380-first-class-bangkok-to-london-from-2571-residence-upgrade-available/

For more trip reports, please subscribe to my channel!
